DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether theory- evidence-based intervention aim promote active transport short distance travel among old adolescent effective increase attitude , subjective norm , self-efficacy , awareness habit towards active transport , intention use active transport obtain drive license .
DOC.brief_title: An Intervention Promote Active Transport Short Distance Travel Older Adolescents
DOC.criteria: must understand Dutch must participate project 'Driving License School ' Flemish Foundation Traffic Knowledge young 16 year old old 19 year old already drive license
